item.description:
City Wide Open Studios

Lets start out at West Cove Gallery in West Haven, then we may move on to Gilbert Street in West Haven. Our last stop will be in Westville Village in New Haven.

West Cove Gallery -
30 Elm Street, West Haven

item.how_to_find_us: Let meet at West Cove Studios in the Gallery, will wear BW Scarf with Piano Keys.
